channel.title: Shaders - RPU. A GLSL-like language for rendering procedural content
channel.description: /* * ShaderMania 1.5 * * Nodes are shaders or images. The currently selected node is rendered in the preview. You can easily change * which shader is rendered by just selecting it. The selection state is saved with the project. * * You can add nodes from existing shaders from the Shader Library by clicking on the shader and selecting "Add to Project". * * For more information have a look at the Wiki at https://github.
